## Page.clearIdleOverride() method

Clears Idle state overrides.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearIdleOverride(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Example


```js
await page.setIdleOverride({isUserActive: true, isScreenUnlocked: false});
// do some checks here
await page.clearIdleOverride();

```
